attributes.action: Abolition of the unemployment benefit system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lack of jobs is not an excuse for mass unemployment.Lazyness on the other hand, is.Stop handing out taxpayers money to those who cannot be bothered to go out and find a job.This gives those wishing to use the unemployment benefit/JSA system for their own ends fewer choices.It will boost the goverments income.Fewer benefits out plus more revenue it must be a plus plus for the taxman.In addition, it gives idle hands something constructive to do.DO YOU GET IT??? This in turn gives the working man less to worry about in the way of anti social behaviour, ie, burglary and nonsense on the street. "I cant find a job" is just utter Nonsense.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Fecklessness/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
